name: getListOfCommunityFilesThatRequireAction
description: Get a feed that lists the community files that are awaiting action by the moderator

name: actOnCommunityFileAwaitingApproval
description: Take action on a community file that is waiting to be approved

name: retrieveCommunityFileAwaitingApproval
description: Retrieve a community file that is waiting to be approved

name: deleteCommunityFileAwaitingApproval
description: Delete a community file that is waiting to be approved

name: getListOfCommunityFileCommentsThatRequireAction
description: Get a feed that lists the community file comments that are awaiting action by the moderator

name: actOnCommunityFileCommentAwaitingApproval
description: Take action on a community file comment that is waiting to be approved

name: deleteCommunityFileCommentAwaitingApproval
description: Delete a community file comment that is waiting to be approved

name: getListOfFlaggedCommunityFiles
description: Get a feed that lists the community files that have been flagged as inappropriate and are awaiting action by the moderator

name: actOnFlaggedCommunityFile
description: Take action on a community file that has been flagged as inappropriate

name: getListOfFlaggedCommunityFileComments
description: Get a feed that lists the community file comments that have been flagged as inappropriate and are awaiting action by the moderator

name: actOnFlaggedCommunityFileComment
description: Take action on a comment that has been flagged as inappropriate

name: deleteFlaggedCommunityFileComment
description: Delete a community file comment that has been flagged as inappropriate
